Trigger.name: There are some tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Trigger.script:
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} local colors = { trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta", ["ridden mount"] = "ansi_yellow" }
if colors[matches[4]] then creplaceLine( "<brown>There are some tracks of a" .. matches[3] .. " <" .. colors[matches[4]] .. ">" .. string.upper(matches[4]) .. "<brown> leaving " .. matches[5] .. ". " .. directions[matches[5]] ) end

regexCodeList.string: (^There are some tracks of a(n?) (.+) leaving (.+)\.$)

Trigger.name: There are some bloody traces of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Trigger.script:
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} local colors = { trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta", ["ridden mount"] = "ansi_yellow" }
if colors[matches[4]] then creplaceLine( "<red>There are some bloody traces of a" .. matches[3] .. " <" .. colors[matches[4]] .. ">" .. string.upper(matches[4]) .. "<red> leaving " .. matches[5] .. ". " .. directions[matches[5]] ) end

regexCodeList.string: (^There are some bloody traces of a(n?) (.+) leaving (.+)\.$)

Trigger.name: Some (.+) bloody traces of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Trigger.script:
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} local colors = { trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta", ["ridden mount"] = "ansi_yellow" }
if colors[string.lower(matches[5])] then creplaceLine( "<red>Some " .. matches[3] .. " bloody traces of a" .. matches[4] .. " <" .. colors[string.lower(matches[5])] .. ">" .. string.upper(matches[5]) .. "<red> leaving " .. matches[6] .. ". " .. directions[matches[6]] ) end

Trigger.name: Some (.+) tracks of a (.+) leaving (.+)\.
Trigger.script:
local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} local colors = { trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta", ["ridden mount"] = "ansi_yellow" }
if colors[string.lower(matches[5])] then creplaceLine( "Some " .. matches[3] .. " tracks of a" .. matches[4] .. " <" .. colors[string.lower(matches[5])] .. ">" .. string.upper(matches[5]) .. "<reset> leaving " .. matches[6] .. ". " .. directions[matches[6]] ) end

Trigger.name: (.+) leaves (.+)\.
Trigger.script: local directions = {north = "^^", east = ">>", south = "vv", west = "<<", up = "uu", down = "dd"} cecho(" " .. directions[matches[3]])
